contents.text: Thank you for calling SlashNext in the East Bay, the security company protecting you with cloud-based, real-time phishing detection.
For information on SlashNext products, press 1.
To learn how our cloud-based phishing detection works, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a product specialist who can explain our real-time phishing detection technology.

navigationGoals: I need a quick overview of how your cloud-based phishing detection works.
I want to understand how your real-time cloud phishing detection works to protect my personal and veteran support emails.
I’d like a technical overview of your cloud-based, real-time phishing detection engine and its underlying algorithms.
I’d like a simple explanation of how your real-time phishing detection protects me.
I want to understand the technical principles behind SlashNext’s cloud-based, real-time phishing detection from a product specialist.

contents.text: For pricing, licensing, and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I want to get pricing and licensing details for your phishing detection solution.
I need to know the subscription costs and licensing terms for your phishing detection service.
I need detailed pricing and licensing information for an enterprise subscription plan.
I need help understanding the subscription cost and my latest bill.
I need detailed pricing, licensing, and billing information for SlashNext’s phishing detection service.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, press 2.
If you need help integrating SlashNext with your firewall, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a firewall integration specialist.

navigationGoals: Help me integrate your detection service with my network firewall.
I need help integrating SlashNext with my existing home-office firewall.
I need help integrating SlashNext’s API with our Palo Alto firewall for phishing protection.
Could someone guide me through connecting SlashNext to my network firewall?
I’m looking for step-by-step guidance on integrating SlashNext with my network firewall.

contents.text: For DNS configuration and advanced setup assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our DNS integration support team.

navigationGoals: Assist me in setting up DNS configuration for your service.
I need assistance configuring DNS settings for your phishing detection setup.
I need assistance configuring our DNS records to route email traffic through SlashNext’s detection service.
I need step-by-step assistance setting up the DNS for SlashNext.
I’d like assistance configuring DNS settings and advanced setup for SlashNext’s detection solution.
